greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 0 and for n >= 1, a(n) = n minus the largest term of A001563 that divides n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4320
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{a = {{0, n}}}, Do[AppendTo[a, {First@ #, Last@ #} &@ QuotientRemainder[a[[-1, -1]], (# #!) &[# - i]]], {i, 0, # - 1}] &@ NestWhile[# + 1 &, 0, (# #!) &[# + 1] <= n &]; Rest[a][[All, 1]]]; {0}~Join~Table[n - # #! &[Length@ TakeWhile[Reverse@ f@ n, # == 0 &] + 1], {n, 84}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 31 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 30 2016
